vote.text: Amendment SA 3827 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3827 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S6481; text: CR S6481) To amend the fees provision.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3827 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3827 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Feinstein.
